name: GemBreak
description: GemBreak is an action-packed physics puzzle game on steroids, with great speed and action/tactical -oriented gameplay.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS XP / WINDOWS VISTA / WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.2Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Video card / 1024 MB Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad Core 2.10Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Video card  / 2024 MB Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I was shocked to learn that such a cute Peggle-clone could be so utterly terrible !

I'm so excited over this game! It is a very good game with a lot of challenging and varying levels. The whole atmosphere with the graphic and all the sounds, are a perfect match. If you search for a simple 2D quality game that never will be boring, GemBreak is the right choice.  I recommend this game.

It's impossible for this game not to be compared to Peggle, and in a direct comparison it loses. It's a lot less polished, has a number of annoying bugs and is just simply not as much fun to play as Peggle.  On its own, however, it's still enjoyable and worth playing.
